abstract.t: The intention of this document is to analyze the set of requirementsfor OAM in MPLS-TP as defined in [MPLS-TP OAM Requirements], toverify whether the existing MPLS OAM tools can be applied to theserequirements, identify which of the existing tools need to beextended, and which new tools should be defined. Eventually, thepurpose of the document is to recommend which of the existing toolsshould be extended and what new tools should be defined to supportthe set of OAM requirements for MPLS-TP.
